long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Mixcloud easier to use for Dublin Digital Radio resident DJs.

This is an unofficial Mixcloud browser extension made for resident DJs of Dublin Digital Radio (https://listen.dublindigitalradio.com). The extension improves UX of some of Mixcloud functionalities including:
- Making it easier choose a playlist for a newly-uploaded show.
- Automatic reordering of new show at the top of the playlist.
- More improvements to be added in the future.
